annotation.text: An illustration of a cross-section of a frustum
A triangular wedge in the plane with its point at the origin and openening to the right
The trapezoidal area inside the wedge and to the right of one vertical line and the left of another is shaded gray
The portion of the left vertical piece above the x axis and below the wedge is labeled lower-case r
The portion of the right vertical piece above the x axis and below the wedge is labeled upper-case R
The slanted edge of the trapezoidal region is labeled l
